DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort study to determine the prevalence of vertebral fractures in HIV infected patients older than 50 years.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Vertebral Fractures in HIV Infected Patients Older Than 50 Years
DOC.detailed_description: To determine the prevalence of asymptomatic vertebral fractures in HIV patients older than 50 years, and the risk of fracture during a follow up of 2 years, according to bone mineral density at inclusion, the level of serum bone biomarkers, and the presence of secondary factors such as hypovitaminosis D or/and secondary hyperparathyroidism.
DOC.criteria: Age above 50 years HIV infection Pregnancy Receiving corticosteroids or antiresorptive therapy
